Items.Title: Current Budget Analyzer Files
Items.Subtitle: Item Subtitle: 1
Items.Description: The currently open set of files for this budget and accounts. Includes a Budget File, a Statement File, and a LedgerBook File.
Items.Content: Not sure what to put here.

Items.Title: Days Since Last Import
Items.Subtitle: Item Subtitle: 2
Items.Description: The number of days since fresh transaction data was imported into the Statement File.
Items.Content: Not sure what to put here.

Items.Title: Account Filter
Items.Subtitle: Item Subtitle: 3
Items.Description: Filter to one account. For example, only show data from the CHEQUE account. This filter is used globally for view the Statement, Adding a new Reconciliation to the LedgerBook, and all the Reports.
Items.Content: Not sure what to put here.

Items.Title: Date Filter
Items.Subtitle: Item Subtitle: 4
Items.Description: Filter Statement data to a date range.  Used to focus on month of data. This filter is used globally for view the Statement, Adding a new Reconciliation to the LedgerBook, and all the Reports.
Items.Content:

Groups.Title: Indicators and Oil Lights
Groups.Subtitle: Group subtitle: 2
Groups.Description: A customisable set of graphs, warnings, and current state information in oil-light format.

Items.Title: Bank Surplus
Items.Subtitle: Item Subtitle: 3
Items.Description: Tracks the amount of spending against the actual Surplus from the LedgerBook which is based on the actual bank balance.
Items.Content:

Groups.Title: Transactions
Groups.Subtitle: Statement Transactions for all tracked Accounts.

Items.Title: View
Items.Subtitle: View Transactions
Items.Description: View the transactions will the current filters applied (date and account filters).

Items.Title: Import more transactions
Items.Subtitle: Import fresh transactions and merge them into the currently stored transactions.

Groups.Title: Budget
Groups.Subtitle: Current Budget Details
Groups.Description: All current and previous budgets are accessed here.

Items.Title: Budget Pie Graph
Items.Subtitle: Show the current budget in pie graph form.

Groups.Title: LedgerBook
Groups.Subtitle: A set of ledgers to track the Budget Buckets against actual accounts and bank balances.
Groups.Description: Used to calculate actual surplus in the bank, after accounting for all other Buckets.

Items.Title: Monthly Reconciliation
Items.Subtitle: View the LedgerBook and begin adding a new monthly reconciliation.

Groups.Title: Reports
Groups.Subtitle: A set of reports to analyze and track spending.

Items.Title: Monthly Burn Down Graphs
Items.Subtitle: A set of graphs to track spending against Buckets for the current month.

Items.Title: Long Term Spending Graph
Items.Subtitle: A multi-line graph to show long term trends in Bucket Spending.

Items.Title: Overall Performance
Items.Subtitle: A series of bar graphs to show spending against budgeted values and the average spend over the period. Useful for reassessing increases or decreases in monthly budgeted values.

Items.Title: Budget Pie
Items.Subtitle: Monthly budget values in a pie chart.
